ComicInfo.Summary: Duel tells the story of how skill, brute force and cunning all determine who lives and who dies - all told in 100% pure, relentless, cover-to-cover action. Aircraft, battleship, submarine, helicopter, motorcycle, or just hand-to-hand combat, Duel has it all. Duel #0 debuts in style with stunning art by fan-favorite Joe Wight (Star Wars, Robotech) in an issue pitting an American mercenary pilot from the Flying Tigers in his Curtis P-40 Warhawk against a seasoned Japanese warrior in his Nakajima Ki-43 Hayabusa (Zero) in the skies of China on Christmas Day.
